column4: i have a problem.i have nvidia gpu driver installed i can boot to the os for the first time but if i reboot again it wont let me to execute the startx command .. it gives me this output:using config file /etc/X11/xorg.conf failed to load module nvidia
Is this driver from the repos or nividia?
there is your answer never install those use the repos.
I can't really help beyond this. I have never had to load a nividia driver, I only know to stay away from there downloads is all.
